BitUsed().details: Revert when bit provided is used

Expired().details: Revert when limit swap is expired

InvalidBit().details: Revert when bit provided is not valid

NotEnoughReceived(uint256).details: Revert when swap has not received enough of the output asset to be fulfilled

tokenToToken(uint256,uint256,address,add.details: Executes an ERC20 to ERC20 limit swap

params.bit: The value of the replay bit [signed]
params.bitmapIndex: The index of the replay bit's bytes32 slot [signed]
params.data: Data to execute on the `to` contract to fulfill the swap [unsigned]
params.expiryBlock: The block when the swap expires [signed]
params.to: Address of the contract that will fulfill the swap [unsigned]
params.tokenIn: The input token provided for the swap [signed]
params.tokenOut: The output token required to be received from the swap [signed]
params.tokenOutAmount: Amount of tokenOut required to be received [signed]

tokenToToken(uint256,uint256,address,add.notice: This should be executed by metaDelegateCall() or metaDelegateCall_EIP1271() with the following signed and unsigned params

userdoc.notice: These functions should be executed by metaPartialSignedDelegateCall() on Brink account proxy contracts
